<!-- Autogenerated from JSR docs. Do not edit directly. -->

## Overview

<p>Provides tools for working with
<a href="https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/json#_json-with-comments" rel="nofollow">JSONC</a>
(JSON with comments).</p>
<p>Currently, this module only provides a means of parsing JSONC. JSONC
serialization is not yet supported.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { parse } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/jsonc"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">parse</span>(<span class="pl-s">'{"foo": "bar", } // comment'</span>), { <span class="pl-c1">foo</span>: <span class="pl-s">"bar"</span> });
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">parse</span>(<span class="pl-s">'{"foo": "bar", } /* comment *\/'</span>), { <span class="pl-c1">foo</span>: <span class="pl-s">"bar"</span> });
</code></pre>
